languages.text: Главный кормчий Равор до последнего дня преданно нес службу, так и не склонившись ко сну ни разу за много лет. Лишь когда в битве осколок снаряда прошил броню капитанского мостика и был остановлен неподатливой грудью строгого офицера, он смог наконец отдохнуть, опершись о свой верный штурвал.

Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.
languages.original_text: Главный кормчий Равор до последнего дня преданно нес службу, так и не склонившись ко сну ни разу за много лет. Лишь когда в битве осколок снаряда прошил броню капитанского мостика и был остановлен неподатливой грудью строгого офицера, он смог наконец отдохнуть, опершись о свой верный штурвал.

traits.locale_text: Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his last day. In all of the many years, he never knew the embrace of sleep. Only when the shard of a shell penetrated the armour of the bridge and was stopped by the unyielding chest of the stern officer, he could finally rest, leaning against his trusty old steering wheel.

Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his last day. In all of the many years, he never knew the embrace of sleep. Only when the shard of a shell penetrated the armour of the bridge and was stopped by the unyielding chest of the stern officer, he could finally rest, leaning against his trusty old steering wheel.

Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day, not once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the armour of the bridge and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty steering apparatus.

Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day, not once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the armour of the bridge and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty steering apparatus.

Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

languages.text: 舵手长雷沃孜孜不倦地履行着他的职责，从未屈服于睡眠的甜蜜诱惑，直到他死去的那天。那一天，一枚炮弹击穿了舰桥的装甲船板，被这位严厉军官坚韧的胸膛挡住。直到那个时候，他才终于倚在他信赖的舵盘上，迎来了自己的安眠。
languages.original_text: Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

traits.locale_text: 舵手长雷沃孜孜不倦地履行着他的职责，从未屈服于睡眠的甜蜜诱惑，直到他死去的那天。那一天，一枚炮弹击穿了舰桥装甲，被这位严厉军官坚韧的胸膛挡住。直到那个时候，他才终于倚靠在他信赖的舵盘上，迎来了自己的安眠。

languages.text: Hauptsteuermann Ravor erfüllte seine Pflichten dienstbeflissen bis zum Tag seines Todes. Nicht ein einziges Mal begab er sich in die süße Umarmung des Schlafs. Erst, als ein Stück Schrapnell die Panzerung der Brücke durchschlug und von der unnachgiebigen Brust des strengen Offiziers aufgehalten wurde, gönnte er sich erstmals eine kleine Rast und lehnte sich gegen sein treues Ruder.
languages.original_text: Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

traits.locale_text: Hauptsteuermann Ravor erfüllte seine Pflichten dienstbeflissen bis zum Tag seines Todes. Nicht ein einziges Mal begab er sich in die süße Umarmung des Schlafs. Erst, als ein Stück Schrapnell die Panzerung der Brücke durchschlug und von der unnachgiebigen Brust des strengen Offiziers aufgehalten wurde, gönnte er sich erstmals eine kleine Rast und lehnte sich gegen seinen treuen Steuerapparat.

languages.text: Le maître timonier Ravor continua d'assurer ses fonctions jusqu'au jour de sa mort, sans jamais succomber à l'appel du sommeil. Il trouva seulement le repos le jour où un morceau de shrapnel transperça la coque blindée du vaisseau, pénétrant sur la passerelle avant d'être arrêté par le torse de l'officier résolu. Il s'autorisa enfin à mourir, adossé à son fidèle gouvernail.
languages.original_text: Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

traits.locale_text: Le maître timonier Ravor continua d'assurer ses fonctions jusqu'au jour de sa mort, sans jamais succomber à l'appel du sommeil. Il trouva seulement le repos le jour où un morceau de métal entra en collision avec la coque du vaisseau, pénétrant sur la passerelle avant d'être arrêté par le torse de l'officier résolu. Il s'autorisa enfin à mourir, adossé à son fidèle gouvernail.

languages.text: El maestro timonel Ravor cumplió con sus deberes con diligencia hasta el día de su muerte, sin sucumbir ni en una sola ocasión al dulce abrazo del sueño. No conoció el descanso hasta que un proyectil atravesó el blindaje del puente e impactó contra el pecho del oficial obstinado, que murió apoyado contra su fiel timón.
languages.original_text: Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

traits.locale_text: El maestro timonel Ravor cumplió con sus deberes con diligencia hasta el día de su muerte, sin sucumbir ni en una sola ocasión al dulce abrazo del sueño. No conoció el descanso hasta que un proyectil atravesó el blindaje del puente e impactó contra el pecho del oficial obstinado, que murió apoyado contra su fiel timón.

languages.text: マスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアは死ぬ間際まで職務に励み、一度も眠りに落ちることはなかった。砲弾の破片がブリッジの装甲を貫通し、船尾士官の不屈の胸で止まった時、彼は信頼を置く操舵輪にもたれかかり、ようやく安息を得たのである。
languages.original_text: Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

traits.locale_text: マスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアは死ぬ間際まで職務に励み、一度も眠りに落ちることはなかった。砲弾の破片がブリッジの装甲を貫通し、船尾士官の不屈の胸で止まった時、彼は信頼を置く操舵輪にもたれかかり、ようやく安息を得たのである。

languages.text: Başserdümen Ravor; kendisini uykunun kucağına bir kez olsun bırakmadan, öldüğü güne kadar vazifelerini özenle yerine getirmeyi sürdürdü. Bir mermi, köprünün zırhlı gövdesini delip katı subayın yılmaz göğsünde durduğunda güvenilir dümenine yaslandı ve dinlenmenin ne demek olduğunu ilk kez öğrendi.
languages.original_text: Master Helmsman Ravor diligently executed his duties until his dying day without once succumbing to sleep's sweet embrace. Only when a piece of shell penetrated the bridge's armoured hull and was stopped by the stern officer's unyielding chest did he finally know rest, leaning against his trusty helm.

traits.locale_text: Başserdümen Ravor, kendisini uykunun kucağına bir kez olsun bırakmadan, öldüğü güne kadar vazifelerini özenle yerine getirmeyi sürdürdü. Bir mermi, köprünün zırhlı gövdesini delip katı subayın eğilmek nedir bilmez göğsünde durduğunda, güvenilir dümenine yaslandı ve ilk kez dinlenmenin ne demek olduğunu öğrendi.
